title: REST client - better validation of configuration/logging

labels.name: triage/needs-reproducer
labels.description: We are waiting for a reproducer.

body:
### Describe the bug

When the service URL of reactive REST client has a typo, things don't work without any logging/exceptions, making it laborious to troubleshoot.


### Expected behavior

An error on server startup and/or when invoking the service

### Actual behavior

No errors on server startup, no log, calling the client service just does nothing

### How to Reproduce?

1. Have a project that uses REST client reactive
2. in application.properties, modify quarkus.rest-client.some-service.url to have an invalid URL (in my case, I had the protocol repeating)
